personal.name: Tayyab Ahmer
personal.title: Backend Developer
personal.summary: Detail-oriented Backend Developer with hands-on experience building scalable and secure systems across fintech, e-commerce, and automation domains. Proficient in NestJS, Node.js, TypeORM, and PostgreSQL, with a strong emphasis on RESTful APIs, JWT-based authentication, and database optimization.

experience.title: Backend Developer
responsibilities: Developed and maintained scalable backend solutions using NestJS, Node.js, TypeORM, and PostgreSQL for various client applications
Designed and fine-tuned RESTful APIs, enhancing performance and reducing database load
Implemented secure authentication mechanisms and RBAC (Role-Based Access Control) using JWT
Integrated third-party APIs and improved data operations through optimized queries

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science

projects.name: Transaction Monitoring System
projects.description: Engineered a backend system to detect and flag suspicious transactions for review. Integrated an external API to verify sanctioned users, triggering alerts and auto-opening cases. Secured endpoints using JWT authentication and role-based access control.

projects.name: Vaulex: Wallet Management System
projects.description: Built a digital wallet platform allowing users to transfer funds between internal and external accounts. Designed an admin dashboard to monitor company users and track total wallet balances. Ensured secure and reliable transaction handling with real-time balance updates.

projects.name: E-commerce Sales Product Scraper
projects.description: Created a web scraper to extract discounted product data from multiple e-commerce sites. Utilized Puppeteer for effective scraping and structured data storage. Enhanced logic to support pagination and dynamic content rendering.
